channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens Russia with sanctions, tariffs until ceasefire with Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump said he would turn up the heat on Russia to seek a deal that would end its war with Ukraine.

item.title: U.S. spaceplane deorbits after secret mission and lands in California

item.title: Paul Tazewell on vision behind "Wicked" costume transformation
item.description: From dreaming under Ohio stars to reimagining Oz, Paul Tazewell became the first Black man to win a costume design at the Oscars.

item.title: A South Carolina man is set to become the first executed by firing squad in 15 years

Trump says he sent letter to Iran leader calling for nuclear negotiations
item.description: As Iran's nuclear program advances, the country's foreign minister says Tehran won't negotiate under President Trump's "maximum pressure."

item.title: How job cuts at NOAA could impact weather forecasting
item.description: More than 580 NOAA and National Weather Service staffers have already been dismissed as part of government agency cuts, with more possible.

item.title: Trump says he's considering Russia sanctions until Ukraine ceasefire is reached
item.description: President Trump said in a social media post that Russia and Ukraine should get to the negotiating table "right now."

item.title: Detroit Zoo's "super fluffy" baby penguin has outgrown his parents
item.description: The baby penguin is just 6 months old and the same weight as an average toddler.
